House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00047
FULL TITLE :
SHORT TITLE : Bombing At Plaza Miranda
ABSTRACT : Rep. Manuel Luis T. Lopez...spoke on two important events in Philippine history that happened in August 21: 1) the Plaza Miranda bombing during the miting de avance of the opposition Liberal Party; and 2) when Ninoy Aquino upon his return home after a three-year exile in the United States was gunned down at the tarmac of the old Manila International Airport... cited the important lessons that the people should learn from these two important events and expressed hope that the young would look back and reflect on the lessons learned on this very significant day and recall the sacrifice and heroism of these brave and courageous men as the country commemorate the events of August 21. He then called upon the Members to rededicate themselves to the fundamental right of freedom of speech and independence; and to unite and take action whenever these primordial values are threatened. (House Jounal No.13,p.13)
